events.name: Decarbonisation of the transportation sector
events.wd_description: The transportation sector is shifting towards electric vehicles (EVs) equipped mainly with Lithium-Ion Batteries (LIBs) as a means to decarbonize.
events.description: The transportation sector is shifting towards electric vehicles (EVs) equipped mainly with Lithium-Ion Batteries (LIBs) as a means to decarbonize.

events.name: Graphite supply chain
events.wd_description: The primary anode material for LIBs is graphite, sourced as either natural graphite or synthetic graphite. Rapid LIB penetration might disrupt these graphite value chains.
events.description: The primary anode material for LIBs is graphite, sourced as either natural graphite or synthetic graphite. Rapid LIB penetration might disrupt these graphite value chains.

events.name: Natural graphite
events.wd_description: Natural graphite is mined and sourced directly from graphite ore.
events.description: Natural graphite is mined and sourced directly from graphite ore.

events.name: Mining
events.wd_description: Mining activities for extracting natural graphite from the earth.
events.description: Mining activities for extracting natural graphite from the earth.

events.name: Geographic origin analysis
events.wd_description: Analysis to determine the geographical sources of natural graphite supply and potential barriers to its expansion.
events.description: Analysis to determine the geographical sources of natural graphite supply and potential barriers to its expansion.

events.name: Synthetic graphite
events.wd_description: Synthetic graphite is produced from a carbon precursor, usually needle coke.
events.description: Synthetic graphite is produced from a carbon precursor, usually needle coke.

events.name: Needle coke
events.wd_description: Needle coke is a carbon precursor used to produce synthetic graphite.
events.description: Needle coke is a carbon precursor used to produce synthetic graphite.

events.name: Petroleum refineries
events.wd_description: Refineries process petroleum to produce needle coke, a critical material for synthetic graphite.
events.description: Refineries process petroleum to produce needle coke, a critical material for synthetic graphite.

events.name: Parametric model development
events.wd_description: A model was developed to quantify flows in the graphite value chain and its use in EVs between 2020 and 2050 under various scenarios.
events.description: A model was developed to quantify flows in the graphite value chain and its use in EVs between 2020 and 2050 under various scenarios.

events.name: Scenarios
events.wd_description: The model includes scenarios on vehicle ownership, EV penetration, battery chemistries, and the share of natural versus synthetic graphite in batteries.
events.description: The model includes scenarios on vehicle ownership, EV penetration, battery chemistries, and the share of natural versus synthetic graphite in batteries.

events.name: EV penetration
events.wd_description: Scenarios considering the rate of EV adoption and penetration in the market.
events.description: Scenarios considering the rate of EV adoption and penetration in the market.

events.name: Battery chemistries
events.wd_description: Different battery chemistries considered in the scenarios.
events.description: Different battery chemistries considered in the scenarios.

events.name: Recycling technologies
events.wd_description: Various recycling technologies considered in the scenarios.
events.description: Various recycling technologies considered in the scenarios.

events.name: Monte Carlo simulation
events.wd_description: Monte Carlo simulation was used to assess the uncertainty of the results in the model.
events.description: Monte Carlo simulation was used to assess the uncertainty of the results in the model.

events.name: Recycling and societal changes
events.wd_description: Efficient recycling techniques combined with societal changes, such as lower vehicle ownership and smaller vehicles, are needed to mitigate graphite supply shortages.
events.description: Efficient recycling techniques combined with societal changes, such as lower vehicle ownership and smaller vehicles, are needed to mitigate graphite supply shortages.

events.name: Recycling techniques
events.wd_description: The combination of the most efficient recycling techniques is essential to mitigate the risk of graphite supply shortages.
events.description: The combination of the most efficient recycling techniques is essential to mitigate the risk of graphite supply shortages.

events.name: Societal changes
events.wd_description: Societal changes such as lower vehicle ownership and smaller vehicles can help reduce the demand for graphite.
events.description: Societal changes such as lower vehicle ownership and smaller vehicles can help reduce the demand for graphite.
